page.title: 07SCHOOL LIFE AT RUDGWICK C.P.
page.content: The{LOCATION}of the new school built in{1972}is in a quiet and safe{CUL-DE- {SAC.}The school grounds is bordered by housing estates on{3}of its sides but backs onto an area of{MIXED DECIDUOUS {WOODLAND}and an old, disused{RAILWAY {LINE.}This is now part of a{DOWNSLINK a{NATURE WALK}linking{2}famous{FOOT- {PATHS}from the{NORTH}to the{SOUTHDOWNS {HILLS}and is an area often used for nature lessons.The school grounds con- sist of a{PLAYING-FIELD}which is used for{FOOTBALL, HOCKEY, CRICKET,ROUNDERS {and a SUSSEX}bat & ball game called {STOOLBALL.}The school also has a{SWIM- {MING POOL}and a{SANDPIT}for{ATHLETIC events such as{LONGJUMP}&{HIGHJUMP. The buildings consist of{7}classrooms, a large{HALL}which is used for{PHYSI- {CAL EDUCATION}and{DINING.}The meals from the on-site{CANTEEN}are excellent and very few children have sandwiches.
